passages.content:
Come to the Maxley Heights Center for Horticulture and learn how to create a beautiful, eco-friendly garden for your home or business. [131]. We will teach you how to plant a rain garden, which is simply a shallow sunken garden [132] a special soil mix to filter pollutants from rainwater flowing from nearby roads and rooftops. These gardens can be landscaped with native plants and flowers. [133], rain gardens are always beneficial to the local environment. Among other things, [134] improve drainage and protect rivers and streams.

To register, visit www.maxley-horticulture.org.

options.label: A
options.text: Children of all ages will enjoy the new exhibits.

options.label: B
options.text: Learn about rainfall patterns across the region.

options.label: C
options.text: Build a set of simple patio furniture with easy-to-acquire materials.

options.label: D
options.text: Next Saturday at 4 P.M., we are hosting a free workshop for the public.

questions.translation: 게다가 이번 시즌에는 작물 수확량도 많을 것으로 예상됩니다.
questions.explanation:
This season's excellent weather has yielded more than growers may find buyers for, and to aggravate the situation, even bigger yields are expected. 
(이번 시즌의 좋은 날씨로 인해 수확량이 많아 판매처를 찾기 힘들고 설상가상으로 더 많은 수확이 예상된다.)

This season's excellent weather has yielded more than growers may find buyers for. Therefore, to ensure that they can sell their produce, we wish to announce that we are willing to support them 
(좋은 날씨로 인해 수확량이 많아 판매처를 찾기 힘들기 때문에 농부들의 생산품을 판매할 수 있게 지속적으로 돕고 싶다는 내용이다)

This season's excellent weather has yielded more than growers may find buyers for. Therefore, to ensure that they can sell their produce, we wish to announce that we are willing to support them. 
(좋은 날씨로 인해 수확량이 많아 판매처를 찾기 힘들기 때문에 농부들의 생산품을 판매할 수 있게 돕고 싶다는 내용이므로 따라서(Therefore)가 적절하다.)

Transportation, heavy crops, and frequently available water allow these farmers to harvest plentiful crops. 
(수송, 무거운 작물, 풍족한 물은 농부들이 비옥한 수확을 얻을 수 있게 한다.)

passages.content:
31 July

Akwasi Dombo
Fourth Avenue
GA 105
Accra, Ghana

Dear Mr. Dombo,

Thank you for your [135] support in helping me to plan the opening gala for Tokyo's fashion week. The event was a huge success, and I was honored to work with you. I know that our attendees follow your work closely, and they loved the designs you contributed for this event. Your designs received a lot of [136] on social media. Shows like this will keep Tokyo on the map as a premier fashion centre. [137]. I realize that the multiple delays made the planning no easy task. The auction [138] our Young Designers Award program is coming up soon and I look forward to working with you on that as well.

Sincerely,

Asahi Ishioka
Director, Japanese Guild of Fashion Designers

questions.explanation:
In fact, this region is known as having two separate crop divisions. One is the processing of plentiful fruits and vegetables, and the other is growing various crops. 
(이 지역은 풍족한 과일과 채소를 가공하는 것과, 작물을 기르거나 수확하는 것으로 알려져 있다.)

Lastly, it is designed to use water efficiently, which is very important to me. 
(물을 효율적으로 사용하게 디자인되었고 그건 내게 매우 중요한 부분이다.)

options.label: A
options.text: Several other events have gone surprisingly well.

options.label: B
options.text: Thank you also for your flexibility in planning the event.

options.label: C
options.text: Please stop by our office the next time you are in the city.

options.label: D
options.text: Tokyo is a top tourism destination for many reasons.

questions.explanation: 문맥상 학생들이 프로그램 졸업 후 '일자리를 제공받을 가치있는 추가 자산'을 얻는다는 내용이 적절하다.
문맥상 '새로운 사업 아이디어를 탐구하기 위해 필요한' 뒤에 이어지는 내용으로 '어떤 종류의 추가 자원이 제공되어야 하는지'를 묻는 것이 적절하다.

passages.title: Card expiration date approaching
passages.content:
From: Patron Services <patronservices@menachinlibrary.org>
To: Edgar Hughes <hughese98@villachesta.com>
Subject: Card expiration date approaching
Date: December 3

Dear Mr. Hughes,

Please be advised that your Mena Chin Library card will expire one month from today.

[139] must be renewed if you intend to keep your membership for the coming year. [140]. This can be done at the information desk at any branch location. [141] you decide to close your account, no action is necessary. Failure to complete your renewal by the [142] date will result in the expiration of your library privileges.

If you have any questions about this notice, or about general library services, you may reply directly to this e-mail.

Sincerely,

Patron Services

questions.explanation: 문맥상 '토론 포럼'의 목적을 묻는 질문에 대해 '학생들이 직면한 문제를 해결하기 위해'가 가장 적절한 목적 설명이다.

options.label: A
options.text: To sign up for a card, visit your local library branch.

options.label: B
options.text: For questions about library membership, please visit our Web site.

options.label: C
options.text: Renewal must be completed at least one week before your card expires.

options.label: D
options.text: You may opt out of this program at any time.

questions.explanation: 문맥상 '두 번째 만남'에 추가로 푸드 트럭을 요구했다는 내용이 이어지는 것이 자연스럽다.
문맥상 오렌지 베이커리의 쿠키가 '전에 다른 형태로 만들어졌다'라는 의미가 가장 적절하다. 즉, 현재의 쿠키 형태와는 다른 과거의 형태가 있었음을 의미한다.
문맥상 '새로 개조된 주방에 가장 인기있는 것은?'이라는 질문에 가장 적절한 대답은 '조리 오븐'이다.

passages.content:
April 7

Naomi Burwell
43 Waymire Road
South Portland, ME 04109

Dear Ms. Burwell,

I am Omar Ridha, the manager of Droplight Studio. [143]. We offer a full range of photography services for real estate professionals like you. We take pride in composing interior and exterior shots that make a property look its best. Droplight Studio spares no effort in [144] superior digital images. [145], our professional-grade equipment, lighting, and staging techniques allow us to highlight the best features of a property. And once the photo shoot is over, every image [146] expert editing. All these services come standard in every package.

Please visit our Web site to view our work as well as our pricing and scheduling information. We are happy to work with you to customize orders.

Sincerely,

Omar Ridha, Droplight Studio

options.label: A
options.text: I would like to introduce you to our business.

options.label: B
options.text: Great photographs can make your property stand out.

options.label: C
options.text: We are looking forward to your visit.

options.label: D
options.text: It was the first studio of its kind to open in this area.

questions.explanation:
I will check the sports news information from staff that can be used to update the schedule and inform you of any changes. The schedule should proceed smoothly. 
(일정 업데이트에 활용할 수 있는 직원들의 스포츠 뉴스 정보를 확인하고 변경 사항을 알려줄 것이다. 일과표가 순조롭게 진행되어야 한다.)

We should have that report from the research and development office by Wednesday. I hope that will give me confirmation. Matthew and Harry have indicated that they will help amateur athletes. 
(연구 개발 부서에서 수요일까지 보고서를 받아야 한다. 아마추어 운동선수를 돕겠다고 했다.)

We should have that report from the research and development office by Wednesday. Let me know if you need me to update any information. 
(연구 개발 부서에서 수요일까지 보고서를 받아야 한다. 알려줄 정보가 더 있는지 알려달라.)

Matt and Harry will have a preliminary summary that they can give to an executive to report on results to summarize. 
(매트와 해리는 결과를 요약하고 임원에게 보고할 집행관에게 줄 예비 요약본을 가지고 있다.)
